name: bj-vtoclg1f
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, c1), w0, wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), w0)
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
-| wi(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), w0)
-| wi(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
-| wi(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), w0)
-| wi(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w0)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

body.origin:
|- wi(wex(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), w0)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w0))
-| w1

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, c1), w0)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| wnf(s0, w0)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wi(w1, w0))
-| w1

comment: Reprove ~ vtoclg1f from ~ bj-vtoclg1f1 . This removes dependency on ~ ax-ext , ~ df-cleq and ~ df-v . Use ~ bj-vtoclg1fv instead when sufficient (in particular when ` V ` is substituted for ` _V ` ). (Contributed by BJ, 14-Sep-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.)
